original_title: Tundong Magiliw: Pasaan isinisilang siyang mahirap?
overview: Virgie's family feeds on the fishes that lurk under the industrial ships of North Harbor. Their alternatives are packs of tasteless gelatin found in the same waters. One morning when the fishes are dead and the sea's color is that of milk, uncertainty is born.
title: Tondo, Beloved: To What Are the Poor Born?
